# a\(n\) \= \(\(2\*n\+1\)^8 \+ 1\)/2\.
https://oeis.org/A359844


## PARI
```PARI
a(n) = ((2*n+1)^8 + 1)/2
```
## Python
```Python
def A359844(n): return ((n<<1)+1)**8+1>>1 # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 15 2023
```
